Touch that Trump it right the worst thing they could ever say to a little kid so any time they would leave the house or I think they were far enough away that I could slip in the closet and see the Trump that I Would and I've always been just fascinated by the sound of the shop at how it works and
Um fact industry vowels and he's three ... can make so much music just been fascinated by it [noise] and then we move my family moved from Florida to Chicago
And we got to Chicago and come to find out your first year playing music it had to be a string instrument and not a brash so my ... and ... and I was absolutely at ... at Yale and the teacher reminded me
Each lesson and how does that feel with his boat because whatever finger that Iran melted cheese

There was a one lesson I came in and I was about to play by by a black sheep have you on the wall and I made a mistake and I saw his bow coming from older shoulder to pop me in the finger and I just only meant to block his bowl
Or in blocking his bowl I hit his boat back in his bow hit him in the face practice glasses and put a giant norm is well down the middle of his face and I called my parents and they suspended me for the week from school and he told my parents
Your son has no musical talent whatsoever keep him as far away from music as humanly possible oh my goodness [laughter] so
Yeah that was my that was my first experience which
Turned out to be um an incredible blessing 'cause they suspended from school for the week but he insisted that I'd be suspended from any musical activities for a year so the following year was the year that I was supposed to play trumpet but they wouldn't allow me to play trumpet so what I did is I play guitar and my
Math teacher everyday at lunch he would just pick up his guitar and start to practice so that was his his by the much every day so I asked them if I could listen to them that much and he allowed me to listen and they taught me how to play guitar
And so consequently a his favorite artists that John Denver and that became mine and [noise] and a severe went by I did some talent shows John Denver I was dressed up like a little cowboy which I think my parents got a good laugh out of
